example.text: You can't make this stuff up... Nothing screams the border is open for business more than this. We have lost operational control of our southern border. [[url]]

There's a bipartisan path forward: Instead of refusing to negotiate, Democrats need to join Republicans in crafting a plan that protects taxpayers. All eight major spending reforms since 1985 have been attached to debt ceiling legislation.

Today, I introduced the Pay Our Correctional Officers Fairly Act to revise locality pay rates for federal BOP employees. Our correctional officers put their lives on the line every day and they deserve to be compensated fairly for their tireless service. [[url]]

[[user]] just passed a bill to secure our southern border. Due to President Biden’s dereliction of duty, our communities have become border cities & human smugglers, drug traffickers & terrorists endanger every American. To salvage our great nation, we must secure our border.

I am proud that 331 of my colleague voted in support of the Protecting America's Strategic Petroleum Reserve from China Act this week. This bill will stop the Biden administration from continuing this dangerous practice by preventing the Secretary of Energy from selling any products from the SPR to any entity owned or under the control or influence of the CCP or to any other entity that intends to export the products to China.
